attributes.action: sort out foreign vehicles not paying road tax & fuel tax in our country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: british transport companys/drivers are fed up with the amount of international freight on our roads that are not paying any sort of duty ! no fuel tax or road tax, yet when we are in europe we pay through the nose to use the roads. many foreign drivers dont even heed the tacho hrs properly. a system for foreign drivers/companies to pay their way with a vignette like they have in Belgium would not only raise revenue but hopefully deter foreigners from taking our work, also a cap on the amount of fuel brought into the country would  make more revenue, say set at 250 litres.lets help our companies, and ourselves ! and our economy !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
